Package com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker

Contains classes used for tracking runs a person takes with the GPS of their Android device.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocationReceiver
    A BroadcastReceiver that receives broadcasts about location information (like when the location of the android tablet has changed, during a run, e.g.)
    Run
    A class representing a single run being tracked by this application.
    RunActivity
    Activity for displaying the status of a single run.
    RunDatabaseHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing Runs and the locations associated with Runs.
    RunDatabaseHelper.LocationCursor
    A convenience class to wrap a cursor that returns rows from the "location" table.
    RunDatabaseHelper.RunCursor
    A convenience class to wrap a cursor that returns rows from the "run" table.
    RunFragment
    Fragment to display information about a single run.
    RunListActivity
    Activity for displaying a list of runs.
    RunListFragment
    Fragment for displaying a list of runs taken and recorded.
    RunManager
    Singleton class that manages the communication with the LocationManager and details about the current run.
    SingleFragmentActivity
    An activity with a single fragment.
    TrackingLocationReceiver
    A LocationReceiver that inserts the locations it receives into the database for the current run.

Package com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker Description

Contains classes used for tracking runs a person takes with the GPS of their Android device.
Author:
ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)
